title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: 20020409I on Linux Motif and w2k:1. Setup JUnit2.
OB: No context menu is shown when right-clicking on 'fName' in TestCase.java. Instead, a message dialog pops up immediately asking if I want to delete the getter/setter as well.
EB: I expect the context menu to be displayed when right-clicking on 'fName' in TestCase.java. It should provide options to delete the field and associated getter/setter separately.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Enable the option 'Code GeneratorRemove prefix from field names'. 
2. Open TestCase.java. 
3. In the outliner, right click on 'fName'.
